# 10Web Archivator class
Used for creating Zip and Tar archives via PHP

# Installation
 * add this block to help Composer find package
 ```
 "repositories": [
        {
            "type": "git",
            "url": "https://gitlab.10web.io/Araqel17/10web-archivator"
        }
    ]
 ```
* `composer require 10web/archive`

# Usage
